hero.title: Data-Driven Intelligence for Industrial Operations
hero.subtitle: From digital twin to executive decision support, ISAM helps organizations increase productivity, reduce operational cost, and make faster, more accurate decisions.

whyIsam.title: Why ISAM?
whyIsam.subtitle: Most factories sit on mountains of untapped data. We turn it into decisions that move the needle.
whyIsam.problemDescription: Industrial operations lose millions every year to problems that are invisible until it's too late.
problems: Data trapped in silos across disconnected systems and departments
Decisions driven by intuition instead of real-time operational evidence
Energy waste hidden behind outdated meters and manual readings
Reactive maintenance that costs 3-8x more than prevention
No unified view of what is actually happening on the plant floor
whyIsam.solutionDescription: A single integrated platform that connects your equipment, data, and decisions into one operational backbone.
solutions: Unified data collection from sensors, PLCs, and enterprise systems
Real-time analytics and AI that convert data into actionable insight
Continuous energy monitoring with consumption mapped to every asset
Predictive maintenance that catches failures before they happen
Executive dashboards that give leadership full operational visibility

about.title: About ISAM
about.subtitle: Engineering Intelligence. Delivering Impact.
about.description: Founded by a team of industrial engineers and data scientists, ISAM bridges the gap between operational technology and intelligent analytics to help manufacturers compete in a data-driven world.
about.missionText: Transform industrial data into reliable operational decisions that improve productivity, sustainability, and quality.
about.visionText: Become a regional leader in industrial intelligence through scalable and integrated digital solutions.
about.valuesText: Transparency, precision, accountability, and long-term value creation for industry.
storyParagraphs: ISAM was established to deliver industrial intelligence services that improve process quality, analyze operational data, and support strategic decision-making.
By combining modern technologies such as artificial intelligence and advanced analytics, we develop practical and deployable solutions for real-world industry constraints.
Our focus is improving efficiency, reducing operating costs, and driving continuous quality improvement through integrated systems and management dashboards.
Our long-term goal is to build smart infrastructure that supports sustainable growth, competitiveness, and digital transformation across industrial sectors.

services.title: ISAM Services
services.subtitle: Integrated capabilities for industrial digitalization, monitoring, and decision intelligence

digitalTwin.title: Digital Twin
digitalTwin.description: A Digital Twin is a synchronized, dynamic digital model of a physical asset, process, or system that simulates real behavior using live operational data.
features: Digital modeling of assets and process flows
Reduced engineering and management decision risk

iot.title: Industrial IoT (IIoT)
iot.description: IIoT creates the connection layer between industrial equipment and digital platforms to collect, transmit, and store reliable real-time data.
features: Secure data transmission from edge to server
Data foundation for all intelligence services

maintenance.title: Predictive Maintenance (PDM)
maintenance.description: PDM is a data-driven maintenance strategy that predicts failure timing and probability before breakdown, enabling optimized maintenance planning.

scada.title: Advanced SCADA and Smart Monitoring
scada.description: This service enables real-time and historical monitoring, recording, and analysis of industrial processes and equipment as the core operational supervision layer.
features: Event logging and process historian setup
Fast operator and supervisor situational access

ems.title: Energy Management System (EMS)
ems.description: EMS provides continuous monitoring, analysis, and optimization of energy consumption with visibility by equipment, unit, and product.
features: Continuous monitoring of electricity, gas, steam, and water
Decision support for energy cost reduction

ai.title: Industrial Data Analytics and AI
ai.description: Using analytical models and AI algorithms, operational data is converted into actionable insights that improve process consistency and production outcomes.

dss.title: Executive Dashboard and Decision Support System (DSS)
dss.description: DSS translates technical and operational data into management-ready insight for rapid KPI tracking and informed decision-making.
features: KPI visibility aligned to strategic objectives

automation.title: Smart Industrial Automation
automation.description: Design and integration of automation architecture that connects process control, operational data, and decision layers to improve plant stability and throughput.
features: Control logic optimization for production lines
PLC/DCS integration with monitoring and data layers
Human error reduction in critical workflows

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how ISAM collects, uses, stores, and protects user information on its website.

sections.title: 1. Scope and Definitions
sections.text: This policy applies to website users of ISAM. Personal data means any information that directly or indirectly identifies an individual.

sections.title: 2. Data We May Collect
sections.text: Information provided through forms (name, email, phone), technical data such as IP and browser type, and behavior data associated with cookies.

sections.title: 3. Processing Purposes
sections.text: Service delivery, request handling, user-experience improvement, website performance analysis, and internal decision-support quality enhancement.

sections.title: 4. Legal Basis
sections.text: Data processing is based on user consent, service necessity, legal obligations, and legitimate business interest.

sections.title: 5. Information Sharing
sections.text: ISAM does not sell personal data. Data is shared only with authorized service providers and lawful authorities when legally required.

sections.title: 6. Retention and Security
sections.text: Data is retained only as needed and protected through access controls, event logging, security policies, and technical safeguards.

sections.title: 7. User Rights
sections.text: Users may request access, correction, restriction, or deletion of personal data and may object to specific processing activities.

sections.title: 8. Cookies
sections.text: Necessary cookies are always active. Analytics and marketing cookies are enabled only based on user preferences in the cookie panel.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.text: For privacy-related requests or questions, contact privacy@isam-tech.com or write to us at: Tehran, Vanak Square, Molasadra Street, Shad Street, Baghsara Alley, Building 13, Unit 3.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.intro: This document describes how ISAM processes, stores, secures, and governs personal and operational data in service delivery.

sections.title: 1. Data Categories
sections.text: Personal data (name, email, phone) and industrial operational data (process indicators, equipment signals) may be processed as part of services.

sections.title: 2. Processing Principles
sections.text: Data minimization, transparency, accuracy, purpose limitation, and proportional retention are the core principles of our processing model.

sections.title: 3. Technical and Organizational Security
sections.text: We implement encryption in transit, role-based access control, periodic security reviews, controlled backup strategy, and team training.

sections.title: 4. Retention and Deletion
sections.text: Data is retained only for required operational or legal timeframes, then securely deleted or anonymized.

sections.title: 5. International Transfers
sections.text: When cross-border transfer is required, contractual and technical safeguards are applied to maintain privacy obligations.

sections.title: 6. Data Subject Rights
sections.text: Users can request access, correction, deletion, restriction, portability, and objection related to personal data processing.

sections.title: 7. Security Incident Handling
sections.text: For incidents affecting data, we run documented response, mitigation, and communication workflows aligned with legal requirements.

sections.title: 8. Data Protection Contact
sections.text: For data processing inquiries, contact dpo@isam-tech.com or write to us at: Tehran, Vanak Square, Molasadra Street, Shad Street, Baghsara Alley, Building 13, Unit 3.
